definitions.definition: A restaurant in which customers select their food at a counter then carry it on a tray to a table to eat.
A dining area in an institution where meals may be purchased (as above), provided, or brought in from elsewhere.

main_definition: ( chiefly US , Canada ) A restaurant in which customers select their food at a counter then carry it on a tray to a table to eat.
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly US , Canada ) A dining area in an institution where meals may be purchased (as above), provided, or brought in from elsewhere.
